- Supporting retranslation and original restoration features
: Pressing the swap language button translates the translation result in reverse.
: After retranslation, you can go back to the previous translation by pressing the restore button.
- Widget style and transparency settings added
- Supports new languages for 'Translation on image'
: Translation to Spanish/French/Russian/German/Italian has been added.

- Supporting retranslation and original restoration features
: Pressing the swap language button translates the translation result in reverse.
: After retranslation, you can go back to the previous translation by pressing the restore button.
- Widget style and transparency settings added
- Supports new languages for 'Translation on image'
: Translation to Spanish/French/Russian/German/Italian has been added.

- More dictionary information
: Conjugation, synonym, and antonym information has been added.

- More dictionary information
: Conjugation, synonym, and antonym information has been added.

- Image error report feature provided
: Click the error report button in the image translation result to report errors.
- German dictionary entries added
: Dictionary information is provided at the bottom when translating German to Korean.
- Other service improvements
